// src/components/Navigation.js import React, { useState, useEffect } from 'react'; import { NavLink } from 'react-router-dom'; import axios from 'axios'; import '../styles/Navigation.css'; const Navigation = ({ loggedInUsername, handleOut }) => { const [isOpen, setIsOpen] = useState(false); const [userLessons, setUserLessons] = useState([]); const [error, setError] = useState(null); const toggleSidebar = () => { setIsOpen(!isOpen); }; useEffect(() => { const fetchUserLessons = async () => { try { const response = await axios.get('http://localhost:4000/api/lessons'); setUserLessons(response.data); } catch (error) { setError('Error loading lessons'); } }; fetchUserLessons(); }, []); return (
{loggedInUsername ? (

) :

}
